verses.name: 1 Kings 19:6
verses.text: And he looked, and, behold, there was a cake baken on the coals, and a cruse of water at his head. And he did eat and drink, and laid him down again.

verses.name: 1 Kings 19:7
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord came again the second time, and touched him, and said, Arise and eat; because the journey is too great for thee.

verses.name: 1 Kings 19:8
verses.text: And he arose, and did eat and drink, and went in the strength of that meat forty days and forty nights unto Horeb the mount of God.
